name: Space Math (Times tables)
description:
In this times tables game you can practice speed multiplication tables at different levels - chose level which is suitable for you, accept challenge and start brain training! 

Looking for cool math adventure game to practice multiplication operations or overall mental math? Let's dive into exciting space adventure! You'll travel around solar system on a space ship, solve tasks, get scores and open new ships and bonuses, which will help you to grow and complete levels even faster. Which planet to visit first? It's up to you! Deep space atmosphere, beautiful graphics and effects will come along with you in every flight 🌌

Raise your child's IQ by practicing quick reaction and fast problem solving! Commit multiplication tables to memory by getting the highest possible scores and collecting medals from all planets 🏆
Play together with your children, help them to complete gold level, or even compete with them if you are sure that you can count faster 😉

Sounds good? Try this space math game now and enjoy breathtaking adventure with your family! ❤️
